DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Execution Pipeline
On Hold Top 10
Client Execution Analysis
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters: [{"WidgetSubTitle":"Client's Delayed, In Progress, Waiting and On Hold Projects & Jobs","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed Projects","metricFieldValue":"DelayedProjectsGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# In Progress Projects","metricFieldValue":"OnGoingProjectsGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Waiting Projects","metricFieldValue":"WaitingProjectsGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# On Hold Projects","metricFieldValue":"OnHoldProjectsGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed Jobs","metricFieldValue":"DelayedJobsGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# In Progress Jobs","metricFieldValue":"OnGoingJobsGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Waiting Jobs","metricFieldValue":"WaitingJobsGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# On Hold Jobs","metricFieldValue":"OnHoldJobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"queryText","value":"SELECT v.Client ,SUM(IIF(v.IsDelayed = 1, 1, 0)) AS DelayedJobs ,SUM(IIF(v.IsWaiting = 1, 1, 0)) AS WaitingJobs ,SUM(IIF(v.IsOnHold = 1, 1, 0)) AS OnHoldJobs ,SUM(IIF(v.IsOnHold = 0 AND v.IsWaiting = 0, 1, 0)) AS OnGoingJobs ,SUM(IIF(v.ProjectIsDelayed = 1, 1, 0)) AS DelayedProjects ,SUM(IIF(v.ProjectIsWaiting = 1, 1, 0)) AS WaitingProjects ,SUM(IIF(v.ProjectIsOnHold = 1, 1, 0)) AS OnHoldProjects ,SUM(IIF(v.ProjectIsOnHold = 0 AND v.ProjectIsWaiting = 0, 1, 0)) AS OnGoingProjects ,(SUM(SUM(IIF(v.IsDelayed = 1, 1, 0))) OVER ()) AS DelayedJobsGrandTotal ,(SUM(SUM(IIF(v.IsWaiting = 1, 1, 0))) OVER ()) AS WaitingJobsGrandTotal ,(SUM(SUM(IIF(v.IsOnHold = 1, 1, 0))) OVER ()) AS OnHoldJobsGrandTotal ,(SUM(SUM(IIF(v.IsOnHold = 0 AND v.IsWaiting = 0, 1, 0))) OVER ()) AS OnGoingJobsGrandTotal ,(SUM(SUM(IIF(v.ProjectIsDelayed = 1, 1, 0))) OVER ()) AS DelayedProjectsGrandTotal ,(SUM(SUM(IIF(v.ProjectIsWaiting = 1, 1, 0))) OVER ()) AS WaitingProjectsGrandTotal ,(SUM(SUM(IIF(v.ProjectIsOnHold = 1, 1, 0))) OVER ()) AS OnHoldProjectsGrandTotal ,(SUM(SUM(IIF(v.ProjectIsOnHold = 0 AND v.ProjectIsWaiting = 0, 1, 0))) OVER ()) AS OnGoingProjectsGrandTotal FROM (SELECT j.ClientId ,j.Client ,IIF(j.[Date] < GETDATE() AND j.StateTypeCode != 6 AND ds.[Status] NOT IN (5, 4) AND ws.Delayed = 1, 1, 0) IsDelayed ,IIF(j.StateTypeCode IN (8, 5, 21), 1, 0) IsWaiting ,IIF(j.StateTypeCode IN (14, 17, 18, 13), 1, 0) IsOnHold ,IIF(p.IsDraft = 0 AND p.EndDate < GETDATE() AND pwst.[Status] != 6 AND pwst.[Status] NOT IN (5, 4) AND pws.Delayed = 1, 1, 0) ProjectIsDelayed ,IIF(pwst.[Status] IN (8, 5, 21), 1, 0) ProjectIsWaiting ,IIF(pwst.[Status] IN (14, 17, 18, 13), 1, 0) ProjectIsOnHold FROM Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j ,Project p ,Deliverable d ,DocumentState ds ,WorkflowState ws ,WorkflowState pws ,WorkflowStateType pwst WHERE j.ClientId IS NOT NULL /*[DateFilter]*/ AND CAST(j.[Date] AS DATE) BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/ AND p.Oid = j.ProjectId AND d.Oid = j.Id AND ds.Oid = d.DocumentState AND ws.Oid = j.StateId AND pws.Oid = p.WorkflowState AND pwst.Oid = pws.WorkflowStateType) v GROUP BY v.Client","mapping":""}},"QueryConfiguration":{}}]
